10. Hebereke Teacher (Drunk Teacher)
Chinami is a teacher with some pretty busy schedule not allowing to go out much, all male colleagues around her are "old farts in their mid 40s," so she was never able to find herself a boyfriend and remained virgin in her almost 30 years old. One day after staying in a restaurant until dark getting drunk with her two female friends, Chinami went out to hunt herself a guy who is her type off the streets (with an intention to get laid obviously), yet after looking at the pray closely, our heroine made a discovery that sobered her up right away: the guy appeared to be Hitoshi-kun, one of Chinami's ex-students who confessed to her on the graduation day and got rejected for being too young at the time.
